StatDef.label: conversion power
StatDef.description: How effective this person is at converting others to their own ideoligion. When this person attempts to convert someone else, this value multiplies the amount of certainty the other person loses.

StatDef.label: global certainty loss factor
StatDef.description: A multiplier on how much certainty this person loses when someone else tries to convert them away from their ideoligion.

StatDef.label: ideoligion spread chance
StatDef.description: A multiplier on the chance that this person will try to convert other people to their own ideoligion.
